title: Grilled Greek Lemon ChickenLemon Chicken Souvlaki
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano; pour over halved chicken in a large glass baking dish. Sprinkle chicken on both sides with sea salt and black pepper. Place in refrigerator and marinate for 2 or so hours. Turn chicken at least once during marinating process.

Preheat gas grill on medium high for five minutes. Place chicken skin side down on middle of grill and turn off inner burners so that heat is indirect. Turn chicken when skin is nicely browned and continue to cook for 1-2 hours or until meat thermometer registers 170 deg F. Remove from heat, cover loosely with foil and let sit for 5 minutes before serving.
Mix together the chicken, lemon rind, lemon juice, olive oil and oregano.
Marinate in the fridge for at least 1/2 an hour.
Skewer the chicken onto 6 metal or wooden skewers.
Grill for about 20 minutes turning frequently, adding the remaining marinade each time you turn them.
Sprinkle with the paprika and serve.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
